name: Bring Me that Shawarma
description:
Roman is an ordinary courier from not the most prestigious food delivery company.

Lately, strange things have been happening in the city: animals have begun to behave differently and the people around them seem to be in a sinister conspiracy.

Will our protagonist be able to deliver the shawarma and still stay alive?

 

Genres: Horror, Trash

Engine: Ren'Py

 

Features:

* Another episode of Doner Kebab: Fear and Loathing in Samara

* Depressive atmosphere

* Lots of FRESH shawarma

Warnings: Flashlights, Strong language.
